amendment.description: To end the outdated direct payment program and to begin restoring the farm safety net as a true risk management tool.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 833 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 833 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6808-6809; text: CR S6809) To end the outdated direct payment program and to begin restoring the farm safety net as a true risk management tool.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 833 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738.
